source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_00<tab>The deputy postmoogle eyes his letter sack, visibly trembling.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_00<tab>先輩レターモーグリは、冒険者にダンスタン監視哨への小包を託したいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_01<tab>Wings twitching and fur standing on end, the deputy postmoogle hands you a package addressed to a researcher by the name of Marcette. Do your best to put the stench of the package and the moogle's curious behavior out of mind as you make the delivery to Dunstan's Spire, where Marcette is engaged in fieldwork.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_01<tab>先輩レターモーグリから、配達を依頼された。中央森林のダンスタン監視哨付近にいる博物学者「マルセット」に小包を配達しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the package to Marcette, who proceeds to berate her hapless research assistant Hobriaut for misinterpreting her order. Summarily enlisting you as one of her lackeys, she commands you to make for the Royal Plantations in central Thanalan, where you are to procure one live mole pup for use in her next experiment. One of the botanists there should be able to assist you.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_02<tab>マルセットに小包を配達した。しかし、注文が間違っていたようだ。マルセットが求める「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B201 /var>」を手に入れるため、中央ザナラーンの「王立ナナモ菜園」にいる園芸師と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_03<tab>The botanist Gagari furnishes you with the proper tools and educates you in the fundamentals of mole-catching. First, set the bundle of weeds you received atop the mole hole.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_03<tab>園芸師ガガリと話した。王立ナナモ菜園の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E953401 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B101 /var>」を使おう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_04<tab>The entrance to the mole's subterranean nest is now covered with weeds. Set them alight using the flint stone furnished to you to flood the tunnels with smoke and lure your quarry to the surface.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E953401 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B101 /var>を置いた。「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B101 /var>」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B001 /var>」を使い、モールをあぶりだそう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_05<tab>The mole pup has emerged from the hole along with its mother, understandably less than pleased with your incursion into her home. Slay the vicious critter and claim the specimen that Marcette seeks.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_05<tab>モールをあぶりだした。「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B201 /var>」を手に入れよう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_06<tab>You are now the proud owner of one newborn mole pup─a rather cute little critter, when all is said and done. Deliver it to Marcette at Dunstan's Spire, and hope that she will be gentle.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_06<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B201 /var>を手に入れた。ダンスタン監視哨の「マルセット」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B201 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_07<tab>No sooner did Marcette take the mole pup in hand than did she rain blows down all around the poor unwitting beast. She proceeds to explain that the point of her experiment was to prove her hypothesis that moles sense danger not with their oversized eyes, but by the vibrations around them. Quick to declare the experiment a success, she gloats at having once again shown up her erstwhile teacher, Atelloune, and mercifully affords you and another one of her test subjects a chance at escape...
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SEQ_07<tab>マルセットに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B201 /var>を渡した。冒険者の協力によって、謎に包まれたモールの秘密が明かされた。今後も、マルセットによってエオルゼアの生物の謎が解明されていくだろう。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the parcel to Marcette at Dunstan's Spire.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_00<tab>ダンスタン監視哨のマルセットに小包を配達

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Gagari at the Royal Plantations.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_01<tab>王立ナナモ菜園の園芸師と話す

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_02<tab>Place the bundle of weeds atop the molehill.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E953401 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B101 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_03<tab>Use the light flint stone to set the weeds alight.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B101 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B001 /var>を使う

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_04<tab>Retrieve the mole pup.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B201 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_05<tab>Deliver the mole pup to Marcette at Dunstan's Spire.
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_TODO_05<tab>ダンスタン監視哨のマルセットに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89B201 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_LETTERMOOGLE_000_000<tab>W-Well, if it isn't my most accomplished assistant! You truly could not have come at a b<var 1F /var>better time. I have just the p<var 1F /var>perfect assignment for you!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_LETTERMOOGLE_000_000やあやあ、後輩君！
配達士として、めきめき成長してるクポね！
絶好調な後輩君に、次のお仕事クポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_LETTERMOOGLE_000_001<tab>This parcel here must be delivered to one M-Marcette, a naturalist doing research on fauna at Dunstan's Spire in the Central Shroud. Brains, beauty, grace─why, I envy you for being able to bask in her brilliance. Sadly, my supervisory duties demand that I remain in this spot.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_LETTERMOOGLE_000_001博物学者「マルセット」さん宛ての小包の配達クポ！
クポポ……なんだか、この小包はちょっぴり臭うクポ。
早く届けたほうがよさそうクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_LETTERMOOGLE_000_002<tab>Er, anyhow, you might want to hurry with that package. And try not to mind the smell, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_LETTERMOOGLE_000_002マルセットさんは、中央森林の「ダンスタン監視哨」近くで、
働いているって噂クポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_LETTERMOOGLE_000_005<tab>The parcel you carry must be delivered to one M-Marcette, a naturalist doing research on fauna at Dunstan's Spire in the Central Shroud. Brains, beauty, grace─why, I envy you for being able to bask in her brilliance. Sadly, my supervisory duties demand that I remain in this spot.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_LETTERMOOGLE_000_005博物学者「マルセット」さん宛ての小包の配達クポ！
クポポ……なんだか、この小包はちょっぴり臭うクポ。
早く届けたほうがよさそうクポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_LETTERMOOGLE_000_006<tab>Er, anyhow, you might want to hurry with that package. And try not to mind the smell, kupo!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_LETTERMOOGLE_000_006マルセットさんは、中央森林の「ダンスタン監視哨」近くで、
働いているって噂クポ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_010<tab>You there! Research Assistant Sixty-two! Or was it twenty-six? Bah! Who even <var 1A 02 /var>cares<var 1A 01 /var> what your number is!? You're late, late, late! Hand over my package at once!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_010あら、第六助手じゃない……第九助手？
第二十七助手だったかしら？　まぁいいわ。
……私宛ての小包ですって？　フフ、フフフ、ついに来たのね。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_011<tab>Yesss, come to me, my─what in the seven hells is this!? Apricot! If this is your idea of a joke, my next experiment will be to measure how many lightning sparks can fit up your worthless arse!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_011さて、開封っと……な、な、な、なんじゃこりゃ～！
オブリオー！　オブリオー！
この役立たず！　グズ！　マヌケ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_HOBRIAUT_000_012<tab>I-It's...ah...“Hobriaut,” P-Professor. With a silent─
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_HOBRIAUT_000_012<tab>せ、先生……どさくさにまぎれて酷すぎます。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_013<tab>Silence, Halfly-toe! You should fall to your knees and thank the Twelve that I deign to address you by any name at all! Now answer me: what in the name of Nophica's teats am I supposed to do with this rubbish!?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_013待ちに待った研究素材が届いたと思ったら！
……いったい何なの、この肉は！？

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_HOBRIAUT_000_014<tab>But I swear, P-Professor, I placed the order exactly as─
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_HOBRIAUT_000_014何って、先生が僕に手配を任せた「モールの肉」じゃないですか？
忘れっぽくてやだな～。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_015<tab>This is <var 1A 02 /var>raw mole meat<var 1A 01 /var>, Hogglenoe! I asked for a <var 1A 02 /var>live<var 1A 01 /var> mole─<var 1A 02 /var>living<var 1A 01 /var>, as in what you <var 1A 02 /var>won't<var 1A 01 /var> be doing when I'm through with you!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_015私が頼んだのは「生のモール」！
生きているモグラ！
生肉から、どうやって私の仮説を証明しろっていうの！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_016<tab>Gahhh! Research Assistant Number Eight Hundred Thirty-two! Time to prove that you're the only one around here worth your weight in goobbue droppings!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_016……こうなったら、仕方がないわ。
アンタの出番よ、第五十六助手！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_017<tab>My current research project is a study of the behavior of those troublesome talpids─<var 1A 02 /var>moles<var 1A 01 /var>, to a layman such as yourself.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_017私が執筆中の「新エオルゼア博物誌」……
その新章のテーマは、ズバリ「モール」よ！
ずんぐりむっくりしたモグラのことよ、見たことあるでしょ？

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_018<tab>You need not concern yourself with the specifics of my research, which would be far beyond your feeble mind. You need only know that I require one live mole pup, and I require it <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_018ただし、私の新説を証明するためには、
どうしても「」が必要なの。
「モール」は、中央ザナラーンに生息してるわ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_019<tab>The blank stare on your face tells me that you lack even the common knowledge that the Royal Plantations of Ul'dah are known to be infested with the filthy creatures, and that any half-wit botanist who works there could educate you as to how to capture one.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_019畑荒らしの害獣として有名だから、
「王立ナナモ菜園」で働く地元の園芸師に聞けば、
生け捕りにする方法が解るはずよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_020<tab>Am I not making myself clear, Research Assistant Seven-seventy-seven!? You! The Royal Plantations! A live mole pup! To me! Now!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_020さあ、第三助手！
中央ザナラーンに行って、さくっと1匹、
「」を捕まえてらっしゃい！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_HOBRIAUT_000_025<tab>How was I supposed to know the professor required a live specimen? I assumed she was just going to skin it and eat it like she did with the last one...
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_HOBRIAUT_000_025……明らかに先生の説明不足じゃないですか……。
それなのに、グズのマヌケの役立たずだなんて、
マルセット先生、あんまりです。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_025<tab>Am I not making myself clear, Research Assistant Seven-seventy-seven!? You! The Royal Plantations! A live mole pup! To me! Now!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_025「モール」は、畑荒らしの害獣として有名だから、
「王立ナナモ菜園」で働く地元の園芸師に聞けば、
生け捕りにする方法が解るはずよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_026<tab>I swear to the gods, if you come back empty-handed, I'll make <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> into mincemeat and feed you to the ziz!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_026さあ、第三助手！
中央ザナラーンに行って、さくっと1匹、
「」を捕まえてらっしゃい！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_030<tab>Looking to nab yourself a mole, are you? You'll hear no argument from me─cute little buggers, but leave them to their own devices and they're more than happy to eat us out of house and home.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_030え、「」を生け捕りにしたいって？
物好きな冒険者もいたものねぇ……。
でも、畑荒らしを駆除してくれるっていうなら歓迎よ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_031<tab>Fortunately, they're more belly than brains─simple enough to snag one if you have the right tools. First of all, you're going to want to set this bundle of weeds atop one of their mole holes.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_031注意深く畑を探せば、
穴が開いた「」が見つかるはず。
その側に、この「」を置いてみて。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_032<tab>Then, take this flint stone and set the weeds aflame. Smoke will flood the tunnel, and the moles'll come bursting to the surface for a breath of fresh air.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_032それから「」を使って、
「」に着火してちょうだい。
煙にいぶされて、モールが飛び出してくるはずよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_033<tab>Mind you, I said <var 1A 02 /var>moles<var 1A 01 /var>, plural─your little pup won't put up much of a fight, but his mother won't be so keen to part with her young. You'd best brace yourself for a fight.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_033ただし、親モールは幼獣を守ろうと、
怒り狂うはずだから……くれぐれも気をつけてね。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_035<tab>Thankfully, moles are more belly than brains─simple enough to snag with the tools I gave you. First of all, you're going to want to set a bundle of weeds atop one of their mole holes.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_035注意深く畑を探せば、
穴が開いた「」が見つかるはず。
その側に、この「」を置いてみて。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_036<tab>Then, use that flint stone to set the weeds aflame. Smoke will flood the tunnel, and the moles'll come bursting to the surface for a breath of fresh air.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_036それから「」を使って、
「」に着火してちょうだい。
煙にいぶされて、モールが飛び出してくるはずよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_037<tab>Mind you, I said <var 1A 02 /var>moles<var 1A 01 /var>, plural─your little pup won't put up much of a fight, but his mother won't be so keen to part with her young. You'd best brace yourself for a fight.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_GAGARI_000_037ただし、親モールは幼獣を守ろうと、
怒り狂うはずだから……くれぐれも気をつけてね。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>With a squeal of fury, the mother mole is upon you!
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>敵の気配を感じた！！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_POPMESSAGE_000_001<tab>
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_POPMESSAGE_000_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_040<tab>Research Assistant Whatever-your-number-was! I swear to the gods, if you've come back empty-handed, I'll use <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> for my next research specimen!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_040さあ、第三助手！
中央ザナラーンに行って、さくっと1匹、
「」を捕まえてらっしゃい！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_041<tab>Well, look at this! A mole pup! A scrawny little runt if I ever saw one, but what can I say─my experience with certain research assistants has left me with a soft spot for half-wits, monsters, and ugly things.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_041お待ちかねの「」ね？
さすが、私の第一助手、どこかの役立たずとは大違いだわ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_042<tab>Don't worry, my misshapen beauty, I'll be very, verrry gentle. Apricot! You'd best be taking notes!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_042フフフフ……クククククク……！
さあ、実験の開始よ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_043<tab>Die, foul vermin! Die, die, die! Bwahahahahahaha!!!
target: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_043<tab>うりゃ、どりゃ、どっせーい！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_HOBRIAUT_000_044<tab>P-Professor, what are you doing to the poor beast!?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_HOBRIAUT_000_044そ、そんな……マルセット先生！
いくらなんでも！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_045<tab>To the seventh hell with you, I say! Ahahahahahaha!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_045これならどう！？
お次は、これをこうして……アハハハハハッ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_HOBRIAUT_000_046<tab>In Nophica's name, Professor, h-have mercy!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_HOBRIAUT_000_046ひ、ひどい……むごい……
あんまりです～！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_047<tab>And once again, my hypothesis proves true!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_047ハァ、ハァ、ハァ……
やっぱり私の仮説は正しかったわ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_048<tab>Have you never found it strange that─despite spending the better part of their lives in tunnels beneath the soil─moles possess unusually large eyes?
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_048モールっていうのはね、
トンネル状の巣穴を掘って暮らす生物なの。
それにも関わらず、やたらと大きな目を持っているでしょ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_049<tab>Of course you haven't, because you possess the mental faculties of a dimmer-than-average dormouse. But that doesn't matter. What matters is that <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> have.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_049私の師匠「アテルーネ」は、
その目は薄暗い巣穴の中で、獲物を捕らえるために、
発達したものだという説を主張してきた。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_050<tab>My self-styled teacher Atelloune posited that their eyes grew large that they might better see their prey in the darkness, but I thought─no, I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var> different!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_050でも、私の考えは違う。
この大きな鼻が、微弱な震動も敏感に感じ取り、
「揺れ」を「視て」周囲を認識しているのよ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_051<tab>I theorized that their eyes─regardless of their size─were nigh useless. That they did not see, but rather <var 1A 02 /var>felt<var 1A 01 /var> the vibrations around them to identify potential prey─and foes.
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_051事実、目が十分に開いていない「モールの幼獣」が、
見事に震動の方向を見分け、的確に逃げ回っていたわ。

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_052<tab>Did you see how the mole pup─its eyes still shut─squealed and squirmed in abject terror as I rained blows down all around him? Once again it is proven! Atelloune is a fool─the student has surpassed the teacher!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_052これで……これで、師匠の鼻を明かしてやれる！
私の斬新な新説を前に、むせび泣くがいいわ！
ククククク……アハハハハハッ！

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_053<tab>I would retain the pup for further study, but I have another mole that has outgrown its usefulness─consider it yours. What should you do with it? How should <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> know!? Burn it, vivisect it, skin it and eat it for all I care! Just get it─and <var 1A 02 /var>yourself<var 1A 01 /var>─out of my sight. Research calls!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_MARCETTE_000_053さて、優秀な助手には、ご褒美をあげないとね……。
届けてもらった肉は食べちゃったから、この幼獣をあげるわ。
まだ小さいけど、育てれば美味しく食べられるでしょ？

source: TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>With your successful delivery, your reputation as a letter carrier has grown!
target:
TEXT_SUBPST004_01485_SYSTEM_000_000先輩レターモーグリから託された手紙の配達に成功したため、
「配達士」として成長しました！
